name: Rebujito
description: A refreshing cocktail with Manzanilla wine and soda. The flavor of hot Andalusia in a cup.
directions: Pour manzanilla wine over the ice.
Add Sprite or 7Up and mix them together.
Optionally, add a bit of spearmint for a fresh touch.
Pro tip: wine quenatity can be flexible if you prefer a softer or stronger drink.
